scripts.subgraph:up: npm run sandbox:down && npm run prepare:local && ./start.sh
scripts.deploy:local: graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 notional-finance/local && graph deploy notional-finance/local ./subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:kovan: yarn run prepare:kovan && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/kovan
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn run prepare:rinkeby && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/rinkeby
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn run prepare:mainnet && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/mainnet
